comment.author: 8777250@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Delta Airlines (1945-1987), and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 19187991@N07
comment._content: This is C.E. Woolman founder of Delta Air Lines. Wow! Great to see an image of Mr. Woolman I had not seen before. This image I have put on my Carr-Woolman Flight Appreciation Gallery 3 here at flickr.
